title: 史上最简单最省材料种大蘑菇（原创）
author: player140
txt_content:
本新人第一次发帖请多关照   高手勿喷
老方法：
[img=343,216]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/3[~_02V_}AI)[%X@925]_A1.jpg[/img] 
新方法：
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/N}V}X2E3LJGWCQ0FOKV`_J7.jpg 是不是很简单
所需物品：file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/UK2G4BOJKT2HK4NN_5E33L8.jpg 随便什么方块 10个         蘑菇一个         骨粉一个
教程：

1.先用9个方块搭成这样file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/Z`_UHU2`Q5)R4D@UGH(BE4J.jpg （建议你们用泥土）
2.飞进去file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/P@LB4$JQ400_1Q$({~(49OE.jpg 
3.用最后一块方块补上file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/GE/E37BA73D-F577-42E9-A23E-06386A9916B3.jpg 
4.视角向下移然后点击鼠标左键（生存如果看到蘑菇不见啦就成功啦，创造就听声音）
5.视角向上打破封顶的那一个方块
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/V7C9]83CNHYCJQUA%8OT7EL.jpg （成功图）
6.打破一些方块最后成这样
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/8RIENOS0UF5FR@Z}5UF21LI.jpg 
7.撒上骨粉
[img=355,238]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/B7GSFLZ[OVA3N1GTX4KWBNW.jpg[/img] (最终图）
大家都会了吧


有人问我这么大的蘑菇有啥用？
  挖深一格file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/478231450/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/W2@LGUZUZG)`E)BOAWCX]9C.jpg 
该造一下就成啦家
哈哈哈
